reviewText: Will just throw this in the garbage. Outdated exercise methods that were strange. And VHS is not the way to go.

it says that someone lost 17 inches in 2 weeks. having been down this road, before, trying to find a workout that promises weight loss with minimal effort, I should know better by now. it's been over 4 weeks, and, I haven't lost an ounce with this system. however, I did give it 4 stars because after 15 minutes of this exercise, my chest feels more open, and, my waist feels tighter. taking in all that air can't be a bad thing. great idea for stress relief, also.
This is one of the easiest and best forms of exercises I have ever done. I would recommend Oxycise to everyone.
It is very helpful in getting me motivated to do exercise in the morning. This is a good product for anyone that wants motivation.
